text: BRUZZ is the cross-platform brand under which the non-profit media organization Vlaams-Brusselse Media publishes and broadcasts news and culture programming from and about the Brussels Capital Region. It was set up in 2015 to replace five earlier print, broadcast and online outlets – Brusselnieuws.be, TV Brussel, FM Brussel, Agenda and Brussel Deze Week. These were merged to a single editorial staff, based in the historic Flagey Building (Ixelles), producing web, radio and television content. This restructuring was completed on 20 April 2016. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Mass media in Brussels
title: Bruzz
